entry.data:

HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 60S LATE

CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
